title: TNF Preview, Week 8 WR/CB Matchups 2022
description:
Field Yates, Mike Clay and Daniel Dopp preview Thursday Night Football before talking the WR’s who need to be in your lineup and who can you use as a bye week fill in this week. Then, Adam Schefter joins to talk the storylines to watch in Week 8 including who needs to be on your radar for the second half of the season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Field Yates, Stephania Bell, Mike Clay, Daniel Dopp
itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: What WR's Have A Strong Matchup This Week? Key Week 8 Storylines
